item.description:
If you're locavore, omnivore or any kind of vore, this one's for you. Also if you like organic food, fresh snacks and entertainment.

The Hope Street farmers market is one of Providence's more famous summer events. Come out and sample fresh food from local farmers, stock up on veggies or just try some of the food from the stalls all around.

Chances are there will also be locally sourced entertainment. So come on down.

Since the event goes on for a while, there's no single plan of action. Come and go whenever.

Feel free to use the comments section to coordinate and/or discuss the event.

Â
item.name: Hope Street Farmer's Market
